definition: to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: A plot was uncovered against the President.
sentences.chinese: 谋害总统的阴谋败露了。

sentences.english: Thou hast seen all their vengeance and all their imaginations against me.
sentences.chinese: 他们仇恨我，谋害我，你都看见了。

sentences.english: He will practise against you by poison.
The wicked plotteth against the just, and gnasheth upon him with his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 恶人设谋害义人，又向他咬牙。

sentences.english: Prince Hamlet knows that his uncle Claudius murdered the king his father.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆莱特王子知道他的叔父克劳狄斯谋害了他的父王。

sentences.english: Excuse me ma'am. You're under arrest for the murder of your husband!
sentences.chinese: 对不起，太太，您因为谋害亲夫而被捕了。

sentences.english: The wicked plot against the righteous and gnash their teeth at them;
sentences.chinese: 恶人设谋害义人，又向他咬牙。

sentences.english: Cheng Qian is tricking the Emperor to come to his palace to kill him.
sentences.chinese: 承干要把皇帝骗到他的宫里谋害他。

sentences.english: His wife was sentenced for attempting to take out a contract on his life.
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子因试图雇凶谋害他而被判刑。

sentences.english: Paolo admits that he poisoned the doge.
sentences.chinese: 保罗承认是他下毒谋害总督。

definition: to kill secretly/to stab in the back
to entrap/to set up/to frame (up)/to make false charges against
to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
to entrap/to frame/to plant false evidence against sb
to frame/to bring false charges against
to impute/to shift the blame onto someone else
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
to plot a rebellion/to conspire against the state
to put poison in sth/to poison
to kill sb to prevent them from divulging a secret/to silence sb
to collude with/to collaborate with/to gang up with
